source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a nighttime time-lapse video of the Arc de Triomphe du Carrousel in Paris. The grand arch is brightly illuminated against the dark sky, with the Louvre Museum visible in the background. The long exposure technique blurs the movement of people walking around the monument, and the camera slowly pans and tilts to showcase the landmark from different angles.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
